body_html:
This is an issue with setup.py copying the files, more than the bazel dependencies.
Even with your change, we have to have the changes in setup.py to make sure the new files are included in the pip package., otherwise setup.py will ignore the new headers.
body_text:
This is an issue with setup.py copying the files, more than the bazel dependencies.
Even with your change, we have to have the changes in setup.py to make sure the new files are included in the pip package., otherwise setup.py will ignore the new headers.
body:
This is an issue with setup.py copying the files, more than the bazel dependencies.
Even with your change, we have to have the changes in setup.py to make sure the new files are included in the pip package., otherwise setup.py will ignore the new headers.
